item.title: A New Week a New Challenge
item.description: Welcome to the first challenge of “Perl Weekly Challenge” event. As promised, we would start with simple one and gradually move on difficult challenges. I am thinking for having 2 challenges every week, one for beginners and another for experienced members. What do you think? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Quas alias ut totam labore, rerum soluta harum vitae pariatur, optio, ad dolore, nihil eligendi nesciunt repellat esse provident sapiente.
